text: Bathynectes piperitus is a species of crabs, crayfishes, lobsters, prawns, and shrimp in the family Polybiidae. It is found in Angola, Cabinda, Cape Verde, Fao Fishing Area, Gabon, Ghana, Guinea, Guinea-Bissau, Ivory Coast, Liberia, Senegal, and West Africa. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Decapods Category:Crustaceans described in 1981
title: Bathynectes piperitus
